REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1714 reute r f BC-L'AIR-LIQUIDE-<AIRP.P 03-19 0064

TEXT.TITLE: L'AIR LIQUIDE <AIRP.PA> YEAR ENDED DEC 31
TEXT.BODY: Parent company net profit 754.45 mln francs vs 674.1 mln. Dividend 19.50 francs vs same. NOTE - Company said the dividend would apply to shares issued under capital increases during 1986. This means a 32 pct rise in total dividend payments to 528.14 mln francs on 1986 results from 399.62 mln the previous year. Reuter
